subject: Re: [cc-community] Teaching Commons: CC@School
body:
Am Donnerstag 21 Juni 2007 22:05 schrieb Dessi Pefeva:
> This is an EU funded project for Science, Education and Learning in
> Freedom (SELF) www.selfproject.eu
>
> Focused on creation & modification of educational materials on Free
> Software and Open standards, using free licenses.
>
> Dessi

Dear Dessi,

thank you very much, very promising! In parts this project focusses the 
same aims as the GnuEdu project (http://gnuedu.ofset.org) - maybe a 
cooperation makes sense.

Following a very wide/international approach, this project and its 
selfplatform.org could develop quite dynamically - once it is known 
well enough and manages to gather an international community. Events 
like the one in Bulgaria are quite important to this, I think.

Regards
Ralf
